sentences.sentence: I’ve been reviewing the evidence... there’s something you need to see.
It seems the name you’re looking for, Maurice, is in the old woman’s book.
And it’s not just his name—it’s listed with the time of the crime, almost as if it’s an alibi.
This could mean they’re not involved. They were both accounted for, at least according to this record.
It’s a new development, but it clears them for now. You’ll need to find another lead.
